mapper.sql: id, name, code, created, updated, icon, order_no, deleted, type, url, parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT f.* FROM tb_user_role_rel ur, tb_role r, tb_role_function_rel rf, tb_function f WHERE ur.role_id = r.id AND r.id = rf.role_id AND rf.functions_id = f.id AND ur.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ur.status = 0
SELECT * FROM tb_function WHERE parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY order_no
SELECT ts2.id,ts2.title FROM tb_staff ts1 INNER JOIN tb_school ts2 ON ts1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ts1.deleted = 0 AND ts1.school_id = ts2.id AND ts2.deleted = 0;
SELECT ts2.id,ts2.title FROM tb_student ts1 INNER JOIN tb_school ts2 ON ts1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ts1.deleted = 0 AND ts1.school_id = ts2.id AND ts2.deleted = 0;
SELECT ts2.id,ts2.title FROM tb_video_auth tva, tb_school ts2 WHERE tva.school_id = ts2.id AND tva.deleted = 0 AND ts2.deleted = 0;
